Class CountyDefinitionList

  • java.lang.Object
    • CountyDefinitionList

  • public class CountyDefinitionList
extends java.lang.Object
    Information about the entire set of counties.

    Project 5

    Version:
    2016-11-10
    Author:
    CS 2334. Modified by Nigel Mansell, Kyle Roller

        Given a coordinate on the screen, return the corresponding county
        Parameters:

        y - Query coordinate: Y dimension
        Returns:

      • colorize

        public void colorize(java.lang.String variableId,
                     KeyConstraints constraints,
                     StatType stat)
        Paint the counties given a variableId, the time constraints and the statistic to examine.
        Parameters:
        variableId - Variable used to pain the counties
        constraints - : the year, months and days over which the statistic is computed
        stat - The type of statistic to compute: min, max or average
